occ
***


Description
===========

OCI Control Center (OCC) service enables you to monitor the region-
level cloud consumption and provides the region-level capacity data,
in realms where OCC is available. Use the OCI Control Center (OCC) CLI
to explore region-level capacity and utilization information about
core services. For more information, see OCI Control Center.


Available Commands
==================

* metric-data

  * read

* metric-property

  * list

* namespace

  * list
